description: The AWS::GameLift::MatchmakingConfiguration resource creates an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) matchmaking configuration.

GameProperty.description: A key-value pair that contains information about a game session.

Key.markdownDescription:
The game property identifier.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 32  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The game property value.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 96  
Update requires: No interruption

GameProperty.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair that contains information about a game session.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length.
Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AcceptanceRequired.description: A flag that indicates whether a match that was created with this configuration must be accepted by the matched players
AcceptanceRequired.markdownDescription:
A flag that indicates whether a match that was created with this configuration must be accepted by the matched players

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

AcceptanceTimeoutSeconds.description: The length of time (in seconds) to wait for players to accept a proposed match, if acceptance is required.
AcceptanceTimeoutSeconds.markdownDescription:
The length of time (in seconds) to wait for players to accept a proposed match, if acceptance is required.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

AdditionalPlayerCount.description: The number of player slots in a match to keep open for future players.
AdditionalPlayerCount.markdownDescription:
The number of player slots in a match to keep open for future players.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

BackfillMode.description: The method used to backfill game sessions created with this matchmaking configuration.
BackfillMode.markdownDescription:
The method used to backfill game sessions created with this matchmaking configuration.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: AUTOMATIC | MANUAL  
Update requires: No interruption

CreationTime.description: A time stamp indicating when this data object was created.
CreationTime.markdownDescription:
A time stamp indicating when this data object was created.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

CustomEventData.description: Information to attach to all events related to the matchmaking configuration.
CustomEventData.markdownDescription:
Information to attach to all events related to the matchmaking configuration.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.description: A descriptive label that is associated with matchmaking configuration.
Description.markdownDescription:
A descriptive label that is associated with matchmaking configuration.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

FlexMatchMode.description: Indicates whether this matchmaking configuration is being used with Amazon GameLift hosting or as a standalone matchmaking solution.
FlexMatchMode.markdownDescription:
Indicates whether this matchmaking configuration is being used with Amazon GameLift hosting or as a standalone matchmaking solution.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: STANDALONE | WITH_QUEUE  
Update requires: No interruption

GameProperties.description: A set of custom properties for a game session, formatted as key:value pairs.
GameProperties.markdownDescription:
A set of custom properties for a game session, formatted as key:value pairs.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

GameSessionData.description: A set of custom game session properties, formatted as a single string value.
GameSessionData.markdownDescription:
A set of custom game session properties, formatted as a single string value.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 4096  
Update requires: No interruption

GameSessionQueueArns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift game session queue resource and uniquely identifies it.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:/-]+  
Update requires: No interruption

GameSessionQueueArns.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift game session queue resource and uniquely identifies it.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.description: A unique identifier for the matchmaking configuration.
Name.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the matchmaking configuration.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*  
Update requires: Replacement

NotificationTarget.description: An SNS topic ARN that is set up to receive matchmaking notifications.
NotificationTarget.markdownDescription:
An SNS topic ARN that is set up to receive matchmaking notifications.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 300  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9:_/-]*(.fifo)?  
Update requires: No interruption

RequestTimeoutSeconds.description: The maximum duration, in seconds, that a matchmaking ticket can remain in process before timing out.
RequestTimeoutSeconds.markdownDescription:
The maximum duration, in seconds, that a matchmaking ticket can remain in process before timing out.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

RuleSetArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the GameLift matchmaking rule set resource that this configuration uses.
RuleSetArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) associated with the GameLift matchmaking rule set resource that this configuration uses.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:.*:matchmakingruleset\/[a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*  
Update requires: No interruption

RuleSetName.description: A unique identifier for the matchmaking rule set to use with this configuration.
RuleSetName.markdownDescription:
A unique identifier for the matchmaking rule set to use with this configuration.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift matchmaking configuration resource and uniquely identifies it.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift matchmaking configuration resource and uniquely identifies it.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:.*:matchmakingconfiguration\/[a-zA-Z0-9-\.]*  
Update requires: No interruption
